nodes.text: Gottu, along with Idow, was an urban combat specialist of Lieutenant Judder Page's special forces team called the Katarn Commandos. In 8 ABY, he was one of the commandos assigned to infiltrate Kal'Shebbol to bring down the planetary shields so that the New Republic could liberate the planet. During the mission, he carried an A280-K blaster rifle and a vibro-ax.
